Anirban Dasgupta: Take It Easy

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt8576744

Classificação: 7.4

Sinopse: If you are easily offended by jokes, the result is more jokes. Nothing in life is black and white, except Take It Easy, Anirban Dasgupta's stand-up special. His material deals with hate and love in the hostile internet era, and why both these intense emotions need to take it easy. This hour-long set captures Anirban trying to comprehend events from the past year at home and at work; events he would rather forget unless he wrote jokes on them.
